verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
/b/ Bawo, Thixo Somandla,
Buyinton’ ubugwenxa bam?
Azi senzen’ ebusweni beNkosi,
Bawo, Thixo Somandla?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
/s/ (Azi senzeni na? x2
Azi senzeni Nkosi yam,
Sigqibana nje! )x4

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
/b/ (Bawo, Thixo Somandla,
Buyinton’ ubugwenxa bam?
Azi senzen’ ebusweni beNkosi,
Bawo, Thixo Somandla?) x4

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/a/ (Emhlaben’
Sibuthwel’ ubunzima x2
Bawo, Thixo Somandla.) x3

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
/s/ (Mayedlule lendebe
Azi senzeni Nkosi yam
Sigqibana nje) x2

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/b/ (Ndnesingqala
Enhliziyweni yam
Ndisolokho ndisitsho “Mngci!
Ayidlule lendebe,
Bawo, Thixo Somandla”.) x2
